text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae anaknea chea mcheasa nei mekh chraen chean ning phendei noh? chaur anak pol tha ku a l laoh . chaur anak pol tha tae puok anak ban yk mcheasa krawpi trong thveuchea anak kea- pear del preah teangnoh kmean lotthopheap champoh khluoneng knong kar phdal phl brayoch ryy phdal krohthnak noh ryy? chaur anak pol tha tae anak del ngngutaphnek ning anak del meulkheunh smaekna der ryyte? ryy muoy pheap ngngut ning pheap mean ponlu smaekna? ryy muoy ka puokke ban yk preah neanea mk thveuchea daikou cheamuoy a l laoh del tha preah teangnoh ban bangkeut avei dauch nung kar b ngeu k t robsa trong der rhautadl kar bangkeut( teangpir)ban thveu aoy ph nd chralam champoh puokke ryy? chaur anak pol tha a l laoh kuchea anak bangkeut nouv avei teangoasa haey trong chea mcheasa temuoyokt del mha khlangpouke
